rules.description: Caps Lock to Escape on single press, Control on press and hold.
Better Shifting: Parentheses on shift keys
Tab to Cmd on press and hold.
Toggle caps_lock by pressing left_shift then right_shift
Return to Hyper on press and hold
Left Command to Fn, Enhance Fn Shortcuts
Tab to Cmd on press and hold.
Left Control to Escape On single press, Control on press and hold
Left Option to Hyper on press and hold

to.shell_command: opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m window --resize left:-50:0; \ yabai -m window --resize right:-50:0
opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m window --resize bottom:0:50; \ yabai -m window --resize top:0:50
opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m window --resize top:0:-50; \ yabai -m window --resize bottom:0:-50
opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m window --resize right:0:-50; \ yabai -m window --resize left:50:0
